text.0: son of deliverance come bright god.
text.1: let us twain go together be our charioteer of sacrifice.
text.2: we pray for wealth to thee most skilled of charioteers with braided hair.
text.3: lord of great riches and our friend.
text.4: bright god whose steeds are goats thou art a stream of wealth a treasureheap.
text.5: the friend of every pious man.
text.6: pūṣan who driveth goats for steeds the strong and mighty who is called.
text.7: his sisters lover will we laud.
text.8: his mothers suitor i address may he who loves his sister hear.
text.9: brother of indra and my friend.
text.10: may the surefooted goats come nigh conveying pūṣan on his car.
